## Models

**likelihood:** $Y_i | \beta_0, \beta_1, \sigma \;\;\;\stackrel{ind}{\sim} N\left(\mu_i, \sigma^2\right)\text{ with } \mu_i = \beta_0 + \beta_1X_i$

**prior models:**

$\beta_0\sim N(m_0, s_0^2 )$  
$\beta_1\sim N(m_1, s_1^2 )$  
$\sigma \sim \text{Exp}(l)$
